articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Joint Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Joint Art Performance
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a joint performance given by the  Unhasu Orchestra, the Mansudae Art Troupe and the Samjiyon Band on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the WPK. 
					When he appeared in the auditorium of the theatre, the whole audience enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest honor and the warmest gratitude to him. 
					
					Acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of the audience, he warmly congratulated them on the 64th birthday of the WPK. 
					
					The joint performance started with the playing of the national anthem. 
					
					Put on the stage were mixed chorus "Under the Banner of the Party", chamber concert of the Unhasu Orchestra "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party", music presented by the Samjiyon Band "Greeting the Sun Rising over the Taedong River", mixed quintet "May the Era of the Workers' Party Prosper" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					The performers sang high praises of the shining path of victory covered by the WPK over the past 64 years and the heroic spirit and the indomitable will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind toward the eminence of a thriving nation under the experienced and seasoned leadership of the WPK, the ever-victorious banner.  
					
					At the end of the performance he waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation. 
					
					Expressing greatest satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the Unhasu Orchestra, the Mansudae Art Troupe and the Samjiyon Band staged the most splendid performance rich in ideological contents and high in artistry as it fully reflected the clear-cut political stand and the desire and wishes of the people, he highly appreciated the success made by the artistes.  
					
					He extended the most profound special thanks to them on behalf of the general secretary of the WPK, the chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					Among the audience were Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the WPK Central Committee, department directors and first vice department directors and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and Ju Sang Song, minister of People's Security, and Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President
					 Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Seen standing before the statue of the President on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by
						Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid there were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media institutions, industrial establishments and  schools in Pyongyang, and flowers.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 People from all walks of life paid tribute to the President in deep reverence for him. 
					
					 Servicepersons and working people and school youth and children in different parts of the country laid floral baskets and flowers before the statues of the President in their residential areas.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, commanding officers of the Korean People's Army, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of the party, armed forces, power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Saturday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Laid before the statue of the President was a floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Be Immortal".
					
					 Senior party and state officials and commanding officers of the KPA paid high tribute to the statue of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 On the same day, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons and people from all walks of life visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Party Founding Museum
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Party Founding Museum
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Senior  party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of the party, armed forces, power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Party Founding Museum on Saturday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The visitors looked round various places associated with immortal revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 They listened to the recorded report made by the President at the meeting celebrating the 20th anniversary of the founding of the WPK.
					
					 They went round the lodging house where the President stayed and the Monument to Party Foundation.

articles.title: Acrobatic Performance Given to Celebrate WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Acrobatic Performance Given to Celebrate WPK Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Circus gave its joint performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater on Saturday to celebrate the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Among the spectators were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people in the city, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Put on the stage were physical acrobatics "Balancing stunt," comedic circus "Two fellers," jugglery "Girls shown in a mirror", animal circus "Bears' rope jumping" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers showcased peculiar skill and refined acrobatic movements with ardent reverence for President Kim Il Sung, the pioneer of the cause of building the revolutionary party of Juche, and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has developed the WPK to be the eternal party of the President and a powerful guiding force for the Songun revolution. 
					
					 They also successfully represented the heroic stamina of the working people of the DPRK performing miracles and feats while intensifying the drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Significantly Celebrated
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Significantly Celebrated
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea was significantly marked in the DPRK. There were dancing parties of youth and students and performances of artistes, etc. in different parts of the country on Saturday.
					 Plaza of the Tower of the Juche Idea and other venues of dancing parties in Pyongyang, various provinces, cities and county seats were crowded with youth and students excited to significantly celebrate the birthday of the WPK.
					
					 The dancing parties started with the playing of song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung". Their participants danced with ardent longing and profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung who founded the revolutionary party of Juche type and led it along the road of victory, bringing about a radical turn in carving out the destiny of the country and the people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The youth and students presented dances representing the honor and happiness of having General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the helm of the revolution and the revolutionary stamina and optimism of the young Songun vanguard glorifying the era. 
					
					Artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe and the State Symphony Orchestra and other art troupes in the capital city put on the stage baritone solo "Our leader", piano concerto "Cantata to Comrade
						 Kim Jong Il" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Music and dance performances were given by provincial art troupes in Hamhung, Chongjin and other areas. Sinuiju, Sariwon and Wonsan witnessed art performances and grand choruses given by working people, members of the women's union and youth and students.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Editorially Observed
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Editorially Observed
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Saturday editorially observe the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Rodong Sinmun says: President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on October 10, Juche 34 (1945). This was a historic event that brought about an epochal turn in carving out the independent destiny of the Korean people and accomplishing the cause of building a rich and powerful country. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The President comprehensively provided the party's guiding idea, theory and method and performed undying feats in all fields of the party's ideological and organizational construction and in the aspect of leadership art.
					
					 The WPK has developed to be a mother party as its unity and cohesion have been cemented despite the stern trial of the revolution and it is deeply rooted among the masses and ushered in a new era of building a rich and powerful country thanks to the absolute support and trust of the popular masses. This would be unthinkable without the undying feats performed by the President in the party building. 
					
					The WPK has reached a new higher stage in its development in the era of Songun led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The WPK has become the most sacred party that successfully accomplished the cause of perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung for the first time in history, turned into the invincible ranks of revolutionary comrades of Songun in which all its members share intention and destiny with the headquarters of the revolution and a seasoned and tested guide who puts forward the Korean People's Army as a main force for the revolution and steers the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation to victory thanks to the might of the great unity between the army and the people. This is the true appearance of the WPK as a revolutionary party in the era of Songun led by
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Now our party is bringing about a new great revolutionary surge on all fronts for building a thriving nation by giving fullest play to the great mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation, holding aloft the ever-victorious banner of Songun. 
					
					 The WPK is a revolutionary party that has led the country to a bright future, regarding the feats performed by the President in building a  rich and powerful country as a lifeline, and a seasoned and tested party that has dynamically pushed forward the cause of building such country with very bold and ambitious operations and revolutionary sweep and a great party that has pushed ahead with the revolution and the construction by putting main emphasis on ideology and giving the fullest play to the mental power of all servicepersons and people.
					
					 Minju Joson notes that the great feats performed by the WPK and the precious experience gained by it in the whole course of the Korean revolution are the shining fruition made under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and they serve as wealth of eternal value for the Korean revolution to be defended, carried forward and developed generation after generation. -0-

articles.title: Best Prize and Diploma Awarded to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Best Prize and Diploma Awarded to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The 7th China Flower Expo awarded the best prize and diploma to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia.
					The prize for the best organization and diploma were conferred upon the DPRK Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.
					
					Displayed in the expo held in Beijing from September 26 to October 5 were all kinds of flowers presented by 27 countries including the DPRK and more than 1,300 organizations in 31 counties, autonomous districts and cities of China.
					
					The vice-president of the Beijing Flower Association said at the awarding ceremony that Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia of the DPRK among so many flowers draw great attention of the visitors, adding that organizing committee of the expo decided to award the prize for flower to Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia only.
					
					 A total of more than 1.6 million people looked round the stands of the DPRK where Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia were in full bloom while the expo was under way.

articles.title: AINDF Send Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
AINDF Send Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory message by the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Saturday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The founding of the WPK by President Kim Il Sung on the basis of the historical roots of the Down-with-Imperialism Union and the precious experience gained in the days of the anti-Japanese revolution was a solemn declaration that heralded a fundamental change in carving out the destiny of the nation and a great political event that ushered in a new era of building a revolutionary party in the times of independence, the congratulatory message noted, and continued:
					
					 The more than six decade-long history of the WPK was a period shining with victory and glory in which it made a new history of epoch-making miracles, changes and steady victories under the leadership of the peerlessly great men and a glorious path along which it powerfully demonstrated the might and invincibility of the revolutionary party of Juche type before the whole world.
					
					 The WPK founded and led by the President greeted the golden days of its development under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, it noted, and continued:
					
					 You paved a wide avenue for making a switchover in the north-south relations strictly guided by the principle of independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity and with warm compatriotism and a bold decision, instilling great hope and confidence into the Koreans desirous of national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF will rally all south Koreans from all walks of life as one and wage a more dynamic struggle for firmly preserving and implementing the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" despite blatant challenges and obstructions of the anti-reunification forces and thus open up a new era of independent reunification and peace and prosperity full of vigor.

articles.title: Preservation and Implementation of North-South Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Preservation and Implementation of North-South Declarations Called for
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various circles in south Korea issued statements on October 5 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement said it would turn out in a more dynamic struggle for terminating the foreign domination and interference and paving a wide avenue for independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils said in a statement that the historic Pyongyang summit gave the Korean nation confidence in reunification and taught truth that independent reunification can be achieved when it dynamically advances along the road indicated by the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					The statement noted that the October 4 declaration serves as a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and a declaration for national independence and peaceful reunification as it calls for solving the issue of reunification independently in the spirit of "By our nation itself", attaching importance to the dignity and interests of the nation and orienting everything to this.
					
					 Noting that all the people on this land wish to see the inter-Korean relations radically improved, the statement urged the authorities to face up to the people's mindset and the trend of the times and opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The statement called upon all people to carry on the vigorous struggle to firmly preserve and thoroughly implement the said declarations.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported by Nepalese Figures
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported by Nepalese Figures
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Nepalese Prime Minister Madav Kumar Nepal and chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) Jalanath Kanal separately met with the DPRK ambassador to Nepal on October 4.
					The prime minister said that the Workers' Party of Korea and Korean socialism advancing and wining a victory thanks to the Songun politics are a hope for the progressive political parties and developing countries.
					
					He noted that the Nepalese government and people hope that the DPRK would enjoy prosperity and happiness and emerge a reunified thriving nation.
					
					We will always stand by the Korean people and support their just cause despite the U.S. imperialists' all moves against the DPRK, he stressed.
					
					The chairman of the above-mentioned party said that his party extends invariable support to the WPK and Korean people in their struggle for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieving the cause of national reunification and expresses solidarity with them. 
					
					 He stressed that he will deepen the understanding between his party and the WPK and boost the long-standing comradely and friendly relations.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Sweden and Switzerland on the occasions of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 2nd anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration and a DPRK book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened with due ceremony in Yanbian Korean Autonomous District of China and a lecture, a film show and an opening ceremony of a DPRK book, photo and handcraft exhibition were held in Brazil on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the WPK from  September 29 to October 3.
					Displayed in the venues of the functions were works and photos of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handcrafts made by Koreans.
					
					Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden－Korea Friendship Association, noted at the meeting that the WPK has victoriously led the Korean people's struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and build socialism under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					He said that the association would positively support the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the country's reunification, true to the Songun revolutionary line of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland－Korea Committee, at the meeting said that he will intensify the solidarity movement for supporting the Korean people's struggle to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President.
					
					 The acting chairman of the Social Party of Brazil said in his speech that the party would learn from the precious experience gained by the WPK in the anti-imperialist struggle and strive to build an independent, equal and new world.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched the Korean film introducing the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Czech
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Czech
Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was held in the Czech Republic on October 1.
					Jaroslavc Kafka, chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Paektusan Czech－Korean Friendship Association, said at  the  seminar that in the work Kim Jong Il reviewed the great struggle and the history of victory covered by the DPRK under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicated tasks and ways to complete the Korean revolution under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun. 
					
					He went on:
					
					The DPRK has turned into a political and military power capable of honorably defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation and socialism while shattering every move of the imperialists and reactionaries under the uplifted banner of Songun in view of the rapidly changing world political situation in the 1990s.
					
					The DPRK has achieved shining successes in the political, economic, cultural and other fields by energetically conducting the 150-day campaign for building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					We wish the Korean people great success in the 100-day campaign, true to Kim Jong Il's gigantic plan for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion festiva por aniversario 64 del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion festiva por aniversario 64 del PTC
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion que ofrecieron en comun la Orquesta Unhasu, el Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y la Banda Musical Samjiyon con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					Cuando aparecio el Dirigente en el palco principal del teatro, todos los espectadores le dieron calida bienvenida rindiendole el maximo honor y el mas cordial agradecimiento.
					
					 El Dirigente respondio cordialmente a las aclamaciones de los espectadores y felicito calurosamente a estos en fiesta.
					
					 En la escena de la funcion iniciada por la interpretacion del himno nacional, se pusieron el coro mixto "En pos de la bandera del Partido", el concierto de musica de camara de la Orquesta Unhasu "Jovenes, enaltezcamos a nuestro Partido", la musica de la Banda Musical Samjiyon "Acogida del sol en la ribera del Taedong", el quinteto mixto "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo!" y otras piezas.
					
					 A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la trayectoria de la lucha orgullosa de los 64 anos del PTC que ha resultado victorioso.
					
					 Igualmente mostraron bien el temperamento heroico y la voluntad indoblegable del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que corren a todo galope hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion veterana y probada del PTC, invencible bandera.
					
					 Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio a efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores  y felicito los exitos de funcion.
					
					 Muy satisfecho de que los artistas de las entidades artisticas arriba mencionadas ofrecieron la excelente funcion de maximo nivel ideo-artistico que refleja bien el evidente tallo politico, la aspiracion y el deseo del pueblo coreano, evaluo altamente los exitos de funcion y les dio agradecimiento especial en nombre del Secretario General del PTC, el Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y el Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					  Le acompanaron en ver la funcion los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento y otros cuadros directivos, del CC del PTC, el ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo Ju Sang Song y el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju.

articles.title: Depositados cestos de flores ante estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Depositados cestos de flores ante estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea fueron depositados los cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente  Kim Il Sung.  
					Estaba puesto alli el cesto de flores enviado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Fueron depositados los cestos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, fabricas, empresas y escuelas en la capital.
					
					Ademas, fue puesto el cesto de flores a nombre de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					 Los participantes rindieron tributo al Presidente.
					
					  Por otra parte, los militares del EPC, habitantes, jovenes y ninos escolares en distintas partes del pais lo hicieron ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente erguidas en sus respectivas localidades.

articles.title: Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
articles.content:
Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, los comandantes del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales rindieron homenaje el dia 10 al Presidente Kim Il Sung en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					Ante la estatua del Presidente fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En la cinta del cesto se leian las dedicatorias de "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung sera inmortal".
					
					Los cuadros del partido y el Estado y los comandantes del EPC rindieron sublime homenaje al Presidente ante su estatua de pie.
					
					El mismo dia, hicieron otro tanto los ex-combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los trabajadores de distintos sectores.

articles.title: Periodicos conmemoran el 64o aniversario de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Periodicos conmemoran el 64o aniversario de fundacion del PTC
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron este sabado los editoriales dedicados al 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC).
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 10 de octubre del 34 (1945) de la Era Juche el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					Ese evento historico trajo un cambio trascendental en la forja del destino independiente y el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de una patria prospera del pueblo coreano.
					
					El Presidente preparo en sentido general la idea, la teoria y los metodos de direccion del PTC y realizo inmortales hazanas en todos los dominios de la construccion ideologica y organizativa del partido y de la creacion de su arte de direccion.
					
					Aun en medio de severas pruebas de la revolucion, el PTC mantuvo firmemente la unidad monolitica y se convirtio en entidad politica madre que echo profundamente sus raices en las masas y pudo abrir la nueva epoca de construccion de una patria prospera contando con el absoluto apoyo y confianza de las masas populares. Estos exitos son inimaginables sin las inmortales hazanas del Presidente alcanzadas en la construccion del partido.
					
					En la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) orientada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el PTC entro en la nueva etapa de su desarrollo. 
					
					El aspecto revolucionario del PTC de la epoca del Songun, que cuenta con la guia del Dirigente, reside en que es el partido mas sagrado, que por primera vez en la historia realizo con exito la causa para la eternidad del lider.
					
					Otras caracteristicas estan en que todo el partido se ha convertido en las filas invencibles de los camaradas revolucionarios del Songun, que tienen el mismo proposito y comparten el mismo destino con la Direccion de la Revolucion, y en el probado y diestro orientador que conduce al triunfo con el poderio de la gran unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera presentando al ejercito popular como grueso de la revolucion.
					
					Hoy dia, el PTC aviva las llamas del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario en todos los dominios de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera empleando al maximo el gran poderio espiritual de la nacion de Kim Il Sung bajo la invencible bandera del Songun.
					
					El PTC es el partido revolucionario que conduce nuestra patria al futuro maravilloso tomando por linea de vida las proezas del Presidente logradas en la construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					Tambien es experto y probado partido que impulsa energicamente la causa de construccion de tal patria trazando los proyectos audaces y ambiciosos y trabajando con el modo de llevar adelante las cosas de manera revolucionaria.
					
					Igualmente, es gran partido que impulsa la revolucion y la construccion tomando la idea como lo fundamental y movilizando a lo maximo el poderio espiritual de todo el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que las grandes hazanas y preciosas experiencias del PTC, alcanzadas en toda la trayectoria de la revolucion coreana, devienen el resultado brillante de la direccion del gran Lider y el gran Dirigente y el tesoro eterno de la revolucion coreana que debe ser defendido y desarrollado de generacion en generacion.
